name: default-documents
description: Document quality classification - sorts by relevance and quality
specific_guidance: Evaluate documents based on their intended purpose and audience.
Consider both content quality and presentation.
Group similar documents and identify the best version.
philosophy: Keep documents that provide clear value through accurate, well-presented information relevant to their purpose.

scoring_rubric.5: Outstanding -- exceptionally well-written, highly relevant, immediately actionable
scoring_rubric.4: Good -- solid quality, clearly relevant, minor issues at most
scoring_rubric.3: Borderline -- adequate content but notable gaps in quality or relevance
scoring_rubric.2: Weak -- poor structure, limited relevance, or significantly outdated
scoring_rubric.1: Irrelevant -- unreadable, corrupted, or completely off-topic
